abstract: Fox won the night over all, including the 8 p.m. hour with “Lie to Me” (11.1 million), which saw its audience increase by a million viewers from last week despite moving to an earlier time slot.
snippet: Fox won the night over all, including the 8 p.m. hour with “Lie to Me” (11.1 million), which saw its audience increase by a million viewers from last week despite moving to an earlier time slot.
lead_paragraph: As “American Idol” said goodbye to contestants Jasmine Murray and Jorge Nuñez on Wednesday, the Fox reality show’s 9 p.m. results episode remained No. 1 in the ratings by a wide margin with 24.9 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Ratings: ‘Lie to Me’ Adds Audience in New Time Slot
